item.title: Analysts are getting even more bullish on this cloud stock after earnings beat
item.description: The cloud company posted first-quarter earnings and revenue that beat analyst expectations.

item.title: This fitness stock is a buy as sales momentum is set to continue, Stifel says
item.description: Analyst Chris O'Cull upgraded shares of the gym chain to buy from hold.

item.title: Bank of America downgrades this big-box retailer, cites margin and tariff pressures
item.description: Analyst Robert Ohmes downgraded the big-box retailer to neutral from buy and lowered his price target.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks sold off sharply on Wednesday as bond yields climbed and traders' deficit fears intensified. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

item.title: Chief investment strategist says these outperforming tech plays remain attractive
item.description: Eva Ados, COO and chief investment strategist at ER Shares, gave her bullish takes on a handful of stocks, including Tesla and Robinhood.
